column1: # Per-crop yield unit conversions for GAEZ potential yields.
# Default conversion assumes rasters report kg dry matter per hectare
# (factor 0.001 to obtain t DM/ha). Only crops listed below deviate from
# - code: crop identifier used in this repository
# - factor_to_t_per_ha: multiply the raw raster value by this factor to
#   obtain tonnes of dry matter per hectare

column3: Convert kg oil/ha to t DM fruit/ha (24% oil; assumes 60% moisture)
Convert kg sugar/ha to t DM beet/ha (10% sugar extraction; assumes 76% moisture)
Convert kg sugar/ha to t DM cane/ha (14% sugar extraction; assumes 73% moisture)
